item.title: Which governments torture?
item.description: Almost all states, at least at some point between 1995 and 2005. The Ill-Treatment and Torture (ITT) project by Courtenay Conrad and Will Moore codes Amnesty International (AI) allegations of government torture, including the perpetrator, motive, and judicial response.
